mapper.update: update PERFORMANCES set reporttime = #{reporttime}, productioncount = #{productioncount}, performancecomment = #{performancecomment} where performanceid = #{performanceid}
mapper.select:
select result2.* from (select rownum rnum, results.* from ( select perf.*, prod.productname, users.username from performances perf join products prod on (perf.productid = prod.productid) join users on (users.userid = perf.userid)
and prod.productname like '%' || #{productname} || '%'
and reporttime between TO_DATE(#{searchDateStart}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') and TO_DATE(#{searchDateEnd}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS')
order by reporttime desc )results )result2 where rnum >= #{indexStart} and rnum <= #{indexEnd}
